trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller kantlinjeformat för cellerna i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen kan du helt anpassa utseendet, inklusive kantlinjer på celler och rubriker.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>har <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>Egenskaper som tillåter att du anger utseendet på cellens kantlinje.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: Men om du behöver anpassa fler kantlinjer kan klassen DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle du ange den kantlinjens format på enskilda sidor celler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>Egenskaper för DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle representerar vänster, höger, överkant och nederkant för en cell respektive.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ange egenskaperna på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>Egenskaper för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>att skapa olika utseende för kantlinjer mellan celler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger kantlinjeformat för alla kantlinjer i en cell.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the All property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>Egenskaper inte anges till samma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>värde, alla egenskapsvärdet är <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.target: En av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> värden.

trans-unit.target: Det angivna värdet när den här egenskapen inte är ett giltigt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> värden.

trans-unit.target: Det angivna värdet när den här egenskapen är <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>.
